website_summaries.verdict: For the dog with an adventurous palate, this variety pack offers a feast of flavors, and is especially designed for small breeds.
pros: Multiple flavors and different recipes each pack ensures that every meal is new and interesting
Easy to mix with kibble or serve as is
Dogs can't seem to resist the recipe
Firm texture makes for less mess and easier portion control
cons: While it does contain a good amount of quality meat sources, it also includes animal by-products
Individual portions are small, so it could get pricey to feed to large dog

customer_reviews.title: it made me gag so bad.. if anyone has a brand of wet ...
customer_reviews.text: some seemed okay at first.. but the shipments just kept getting grosser and grosser, and I'd have to toss more than half because they looked rotten... today I found (see pic) a huge blob of cartilage or something in the container... def not going to try and open anymore of these.. it made me gag so bad.. if anyone has a brand of wet food (my Daisy is 17 yo Pom and doesn't have all of her teeth) they love, please let me know.. tks :))
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: On February 24th I purchased wet dog food from your website. I usually buy this same brand occasionally from the store. After about 2 hours eating the food, my dog started throwing up which she never has for the 2 years we’ve had her, and then she developed diarrhea and was shaking uncontrollably. After 3 days, the symptoms persisted and we had to take her to the hospital. We had to pay 444 dollars for the treatment after the vet told us that the food messed up her stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Gurakar

customer_reviews.title: Not good food
customer_reviews.text: I started giving my dog this food because I couldn’t get her to eat dry food. Occasionally it would make her sick so I tried different flavors. Today I took her to the vet and she tested positive for pancreatitis. She was fine before the food, but it is too high in fat for certain dogs and I read that this has happened to other people, but thought it was fixed. Amazon won’t refund the money:/
customer_reviews.author: marisa

customer_reviews.title: Maggots and Horrible Small
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but feel compelled to after my experience with this product. Upon opening the box, there was an unbelievable smell. After taking out the packages I noticed that there was something foreign in the box with maggots all over it. I quickly threw away everything as it was the most horrid smell of my life. I will never, ever purchase from here again.
customer_reviews.author: christina gigstead

customer_reviews.title: ... gets older (currently 14 yrs old) she does not like to eat her dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater and as she gets older (currently 14 yrs old) she does not like to eat her dog food. I do not feed her any table food. This was my first time buying this brand. I could not empty the container into her bowl fast enough. She was pushing me out of the way and quickly devoured everything in her bowl. I did mix this with her dry food (dog chow for seniors). Usually she picks the dry food out and leave it on the floor. This time she ate everything and no evidence was left behind. The is will be an ongoing purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: KCL

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, dogs love, WATCH PRICE
customer_reviews.text: These are a convenient size for my 10# dog, who is a picky eater - but likes these. 80# puppy loves them for a "gulp & go snack". They are kind of spendy for a snack though. WARNING: always check the price before reordering, &/or on subscribe & save. The prices for the different varieties bounce around a lot. I order the cheapest one at the time -- even though little dog likes the poultry flavors best. She will have to get a job if she wants to be THAT picky!
customer_reviews.author: Haven Healer

customer_reviews.title: This item has large chunks of veins which could cause ...
customer_reviews.text: This item has large chunks of veins which could cause my dog to choke. I removed it from my Subscribe List and some how it was placed back on my list. Also on the delivery notes it was listed the driver handed it to me, which he did not. I would have refused this product. When I tried to return it this item was not able to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: yourpalal

customer_reviews.title: PICKY PUP CHOOSES CESAR'S
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product my 'picky puppy' will eat. She won't even eat treats... other than steamed chicken and rice, which I have to prepare. Reaching for the foil pack is much easier and I know it makes her happy. The containers hold just the right amount for her little tummy. She is nine-years-old now and can digest this product without any upset to her system... besides... it has been her favorite choice for many years. AND she is a very clever canine!
customer_reviews.author: Judith L.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs say "yes"
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it, this product only get 2.5 stars out of 5 on dogfoodadvisor.com. Lot's of by-products. But, I don't actually get this as my dog's main food source. My 2 labrador mixes mostly get a 5 star dry dog food. I give each of them one tray of this with their breakfast. This stuff is YUMMY! At least that's what I guess from their reaction as they wait eagerly for it every morning! If I sometimes eat bacon and white bread and maybe even a candy bar, I guess I can sometimes let my dogs have yummy dog food that isn't perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8kees

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: This food gave my dog diarrhea that included blood on multiple occasions. I didn’t fathom that a popular brand like this could put my dog in such a bad way, but it did. Avoid this food.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered & paid for 24 but got 12 pack.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 24 pack and only received a 12 pack. Amazon made up the difference but be careful. If you don't pay attention you could lose money on this "deal".
customer_reviews.author: Jenna King

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Will Only Eat This Dog Food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is fussy and will only eat this brand of dog food. Believe me I have tried many times to get him to eat other brands. This is all that he will eat. I like to purchase this from Amazon, not because it's cheaper, but because it is delivered to my door for the same price that I would pay from the store. It's very convenient for me to purchase it this way. Amazon also has a much better selection of flavors than the store as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive and contains chicken, red meat, and grain.
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive and contains chicken, red meat, and grain, to which our female yorkie is highly allergic, causing her to, literally, scratch and chew on herself, due to itching, until she bleeds. We now feed she and our male only Fromm from the "Happy, Healthy Creatures" store for dry food during the day and "Simple Nourish" wet food from PetSmart for dinner. We feed them only Lamb, Venison and Duck for meat and Sweet Potatoes, Cranberries, Pumpkin, Carrots and Lentils in their foods. ABSOLUTELY NO GRAIN, CHICKEN, TURKEY, BEEF OR PORK!
customer_reviews.author: Solaris Lover

customer_reviews.title: No doubt about it my dog loves this product better than any other moist food pack
customer_reviews.text: No doubt about it my dog loves this product better than any other moist food pack! The vacuum seal keeps the food moist and it smells fresh and I ambsatisied with the overall quality including organized packaging. Got marked down because the subscription oack is for 24 containers which doesn’t complete the month , I still have to run out and buy 5-6 individual containers to finish the month befire the next subscription package if 24 arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Barzanallana

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: How come there are only 18 trays inside when it is supposed to be 24?!
customer_reviews.author: Piggy Shih-Tzu

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food, and as someone who has a difficult time getting to the store due to disability... Thank you so so much for having this available! She's so happy to have it and goes to bed right after she eats at night! Thank you again and again!. Packaging is very good. Shipping was THAT night and got here two days later (ordered on a sunday) thank you again! will order again and again!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I mix it with dry food and baby food sweet potatoes. In the morning I use a dog ...
customer_reviews.text: I use Cesar as the afternoon meal for my Yorkies. I mix it with dry food and baby food sweet potatoes. In the morning I use a dog food that is all meat and not by products so I am sure they are getting the protein that they need. Yorkies are notorious for being picky eaters but they eat this just fine. I recommend baby food sweet potatoes if you want to moisten the food and give them some nutrients as well. There is no,sugar in it so it isn't bad for their teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Bit's and pieces of things that look like rubberbands. I contacted Cesar
customer_reviews.text: Bit's and pieces of things that look like rubberbands. I contacted Cesar. They said it was meat by products and organ meat, must be veins and arteries. I stopped using Cesar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUBSCRIPTION DELIVERY IS THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to set this delivery up and not having to worry about running out of dog food. If you are as busy as we are, this is the best. We can't always find the Little Cesar wet food steak in gravy at the store, especially the larger 24 packages. Thanks Amazon we love you and our little dog RICO does too!!
customer_reviews.author: teri lane turner

customer_reviews.title: Hey, Cesar, whisper to my dog, because he hates your food.  Ask him why!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I admit it. I have the world's fussiest dog. And trying to find foods he'll eat is VERY difficult, but I keep trying. SOMEWHERE there MUST be a dog food that tastes good and he'll enjoy, right? Maybe so, but this isn't it. My fussy dog hates these. Each evening I put one out for him, and each morning I threw it out. A total waste of money for my little guy. I thought it would be a nice topper to his kibble. Nope. Topper or alone, my dog won't eat these. My food to donate to the local shelter!
customer_reviews.author: handicapped shopperTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Stay away! This food almost killed my dog!
customer_reviews.text: My mini schnauzer ate this for a week and one day started uncontrollably vomitting and producing loose bloody stool. Went to the vet and they confirmed it was the food. I went online and found many owners with similar experiences. Now that I've switched to better dog food, my dog is happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good enough for humans!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love Caesars. This variety pack contains 4 different flavors. Each one looks like high quality meals- not the usual lump of lard that you find in most dog foods. You can actually see the ingredients- carrots, peas, potatoes, etc. so I feel like my fur babies are eating something good for them. My only complaint is that for 15 lb dogs the portion is too small but I just add some dry food and they are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Not buying this again online in store was way better! Very juicy and soft
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied with the product quality the food looks very dry and stale it's looks overdue was very disappointed with the product I did get fast shipping and product didn't get damaged though
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tzu loves this food, and it is not the paste that comes in so many cans. It has chunks of chicken and vegies in sauce. But since they are shipping only 12 cans in an order, this costs twice as much as any other Caesar's cannned. Even twice as much as what I can get at my store. I complained, and Amazon sent me the other half of the case, but I will not be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog LOVES it. Price is great 😁
customer_reviews.text: In the review form it asks the rating of the flavor. Though I haven't tasted it 😂 I put 5 stars. My dog LOVES it. He had a bunch of teeth removed. We are now giving him soft foods. Other brands like Pedigree and even Farmers Dog he turns away from. He's a picky Havanese. But he will whine at the pantry door and spin in circles and do a helicopter tail while he tap dances when I show him a container of this brand. Sometimes I put it over some leftover plain rice from dinner and he goes crazy for it. I feel great about giving this to him, and the price is fantastic, too.
customer_reviews.author: vaNity

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog ill
customer_reviews.text: My dog's excitement over this food did not last. She loved it the first few times I mixed it with dog food, but quickly stopped eating it. I also noticed that once I added this food as a supplement to her dinner she began having diarrhea. I would not recommend buying it in big packages like this one until you have tested its affect on your dog with a couple of individual packages first.
customer_reviews.author: BeckySC

customer_reviews.title: My schnauzers will eat anything as long as it's mixed in with this stuff
customer_reviews.text: We actually feed our dogs a quality dry food for their main meal, but with every meal they get a small spoonful of this - a couple tablespoons worth. We've found the classic loaf works best, not the gravy/stew version. Gravy + Schnauzer beards = smelly dogs. Since one of our dogs needs medication with each meal - and is far too stubborn to just take the darn pill, we crush it up and mix it thoroughly into her spoonful of "Pup Loaf". She knows very well we're mixing meds in, but she doesn't care. She licks her bowl clean and the spoon too. And best of all, no fighting about taking medicine.
customer_reviews.author: NewEnglander

customer_reviews.title: foil difficult to peel off
customer_reviews.text: I but Cesar wet for food each month however I experience difficulty opening the containers ..often I must use took such as knife to peel back the foil!!!so dangerous!!today I struggled to peel off too foil!!the foil actually cut my finger!!!a bandaid did stop bleeding ...does not need stitches but does Cesar offer same good packages differently??plz advise thanks Linda Ennis ...charlie
customer_reviews.author: Linda ennis

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these. We mostly use these when we board her while we're travelling. She usually eats dry food at home, but she tends to become more finicky and eat less when she's not with us. The boarding facility mixes one tray of wet dog food with 1/4 - 1/2 cup of her normal dry dog food, and she eats it all up, no problem. We also use the trays of wet dog food at home as an occasional treat. We sometimes slowly spoon out the contents of a tray into her dog food bowl, as she will inhale the whole tray in a few seconds if we let her.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaM

customer_reviews.title: old dog loves this
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a 13 year old dog that had a rough life. I tried feeding him all sorts of food, and come to find out he loves Cesar's! He is 85 lbs, not exactly the little dog the brand caters to. When we first got him, I had to spoon fed him to get him to eat enough, but now I give him dry kibble with water and mix in a container of Cesar's, he is prancing around to get fed!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase this food from walmart and my dog was fine for a while. Then I decided to subscribe and save and ordering the box from here. BIG mistake. My dog was pooping her brains out in mushy poop and the runs for almost a week. I had to change her food to fresh pet real chicken and such food and a day later her poop hardened and she was back to her old self. It’s like this food was slowly killing her. She had even stopped eating her yummy snacks. So please be careful!!! Feed your pet quality food. I wish I would’ve since she was a puppy but better late than never!
customer_reviews.author: IntegrityFirst

customer_reviews.title: Deadly for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made my dogs so sick that they got stomach bleeding and almost died. Can't even believe that it is possible to sell something like this. The company should be looked into by law enforcement.
customer_reviews.author: Pia

customer_reviews.title: Variety Pack is a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It's not a good product because it is actually filled with byproducts. My chihuahua will only eat so at 19yrs old I figure she should eat what she wants. This being said most Ceaser variety packs are equally divided. This however has 12 prime rib flavor and only 6 of the other two. It does come out cheaper to buy a case than just a 12 pack or individual.
customer_reviews.author: ThePadre

customer_reviews.title: Our poodle loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Funny to give five stars for flavor when I never actually tasted the dog’s food, but he sure seems to enjoy it, so... there ya go! We have a toy poodle who weighs about six pounds. He eats half a container in the morning, and half in the evening. We also give him kibble to munch at his Lea sure during the day (wife’s dog, and he’s spoiled silly). The food is a semi solid yet moist brick of ground “food” which we cut up into small chunks. I did mention this little beast is spoiled, yah? Anyway, he devours it like I do an ice cream cone in 90 degree sunshine, and doesn’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer Girl

customer_reviews.title: My little dog loves Cesar, and so do the cats...grrrrr!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the dog foods I've bought for my little mini Dachshund, Cesar wins most every time. (The cats like it, too, to the chagrin of my little Beta pooch.) Of the flavors, she prefers the Prime Rib, then she likes the Beef, but not so much the Fillet Mignon, Lamb or Chicken, for some reason. She does like the breakfast-flavor type with eggs and bacon. (Interesting that though Bella brand dog food seems similar, she does prefer Cesar. However, the Bella dry food wins over the dry Cesar dog food preference.)
customer_reviews.author: MahaYar

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry I bought this (kidding). My dogs love this stuff! Every day at 4:30 we feed our 2 dogs dinner. As soon as I get near here we store "the gold" the dogs start barking and running around. Even my 7 year old rat terrier starts jumping up and down! I've had her for 5 yrs. and I've never seen her do that. They literally inhale the dog food and then each run over to the other dogs bowl to make sure every bit was eaten. Of course they are licked clean and doesn't look like anything was ever put in it.
customer_reviews.author: knoxgal

customer_reviews.title: Last few boxes made my dog sick.
customer_reviews.text: Been feeding my Pomeranian this for the last 4 years because it was the only thing I could get her to eat regularly. A few months ago she wasn’t thrilled about it and when she did it, she had diarrhea. I threw the rest of that pack away. It was ok for awhile but then the last 2 boxes we noticed she was again acting sick and getting diarrhea. Switched her food to homemade and now she’s fine. Poor quality control or something. No more.
customer_reviews.author: Skydiver99

customer_reviews.title: She has bad teeth and I chill it in the fridge and ...
customer_reviews.text: My German Schnauzer loves this food and actually almost lives on it. She has bad teeth and I chill it in the fridge and then cut it into small squares like a tiny cake, and feed it to her on a plastic fork (She doesn't like the metal forks touching her teeth). Talk about being spoiled, huh???? The food all smells so good it's almost edible for humans, and the small size is perfect for her......or for larger size dogs you could mix it with their dry dog food ......it's like a treat for them. My little Sophie has eaten this for several years now and still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled :(
customer_reviews.text: Was doing subscribe and save. Put it on my shelf for a month and it was spoiled (only noticed because my poor dogs weren’t eating very much so I smelled it). I got two cases and now I’m just throwing them away. Thought it was the wait but the ones I’ve gotten from Petco didn’t spoil on my shelf in months even. My ratings besides overall are for normal conditions with this brand/type.
customer_reviews.author: Hero

customer_reviews.title: Very, very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Since switching to this brand, my dog never seems full!!! Doesn't even last an hour and she's trying to get more food. Upon really paying attention to the ingredients, there is a lot of byproducts and other ingredients that look a lot like fillers. However it is NOT filling up my poor little 13 year old dog. Do not make the same mistake as myself. This is neither healthy, nor filling for your pet!!! Spend extra before you subject your furry child to ingredients you yourself would not eat.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My 12 pound Chihuahua/Jack Russell Terrier loved this as a topping for his kibble so I reordered it and then I read the ingredients and was shocked to find out that the ingredients are very low quality. I have decided to go back to the high quality fresh/raw refrigerated food I can get at the local market or feed store and chop that up as an added topper to his quality kibble
customer_reviews.author: Juvae  & Kathryn Carmichael Kindle customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered by mistake
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these by mistake (long story - but was totally my fault). We don't even give wet dog food to our dog (who is over 50 pounds) but kept the dog food for special "treats". My dog LOVES these!!! He doesn't normally get his treat until 8:30 pm but will scarf down his regular dinner and start begging for this treat very, very early in the evening! Even though I had not planned on ordering these, I may have to order more or will end up with a very unhappy dog!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Cesar Gourmet Wet Dog Food Variety 24 Pack-Subscribe & Save Is The Way To Go!!
customer_reviews.text: Get this on Subscribe and Save. 2 boxes a month pretty much covers my needs and every so often I have to buy an extra case. The price is a lot cheaper this way. I don’t have to worry about running out and it’s cheaper than what my local store sells it for. I’ve only had one bad box since I’ve started it but Amazon took care of that immediately. My dog loves it-what else can you say? It’s dog food 😊
customer_reviews.author: MysticMerGirl

customer_reviews.title: One of the food trays was opened
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Cesar food on Amazon because it was a better deal than purchasing at the store; however when I opened the box one of the food trays had leaked and was all swollen and smelled bad (which the food doesn’t smell good to begin with) so when you start getting food trays you have to throw away it starts to be not such a good deal :(
customer_reviews.author: Laura Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Quality good but price is only worth it if not on sale at the market
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Cesar singles and dances around excitedly like they are treats when he sees me getting them out. I read a couple of negative reviews after I ordered them and became concerned about the quality of these ; but they arrived in perfect condition and appeared to be the same quality as the store. My dog didn't seem to notice a difference in the taste. The price is only good if they are not on sale at the local market, but I will keep this in mind for a backup plan.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Great choices, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor choices that my dog absolutely loves. Love the variety. My dog is 16 pound toy poodle and he gets a quarter of one of these containers with his dry dog food. Keep your eye out for specials and coupons Through Amazon that’s what I did And that’s basically why I chose these flavor choices. I’m sure my dog would eat all the varieties that Caesar’s Brand has to offer
customer_reviews.author: Graytee73

customer_reviews.title: Multi-flavored assortment makes for happy pets
customer_reviews.text: This is a 24 pack that has 4 different flavors. My dog loves it so what can I say other I'm more than pleased. The portion size is good for smaller dogs (24 lbs) and the scent is not offensive. The packages are foil-sealed so that they can be easily opened. The package itself is recyclable plastic so that is a good bonus in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan @ Blooming with Books

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with quality control
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item delivered monthly for quite some time and this last shipment was my last. My first was delivered smashed and I could only use half of the containers, I thought maybe a once in a lifetime thing. This last shipment when I opened the containers they are half full of green beans and liquid. The label printing is off also. Don’t know if it’s a copycat I ordered or just a bad batch but I will not order again. I also want to make note I did receive many perfect and good shipments.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Happy pups
customer_reviews.text: They know it’s dinner time. As I walk to the pantry and squat down and grab the box full of Cesar gourmet filets they bark excitedly! I mix it in their dry dog food and they start drooling knowing what’s coming. As I set down the bowls the food is gone in 2.5 seconds and that is why I continue to buy this. Because as they look up at me with wet dog food on their muzzles and tails wagging I know they’re happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Nutrition +;  vegetables is my idea and certainly up to RAGZ's and P-Nut's expectations. 👵🤟🐾🐾🦴
customer_reviews.text: 🤔 I ordered the wrong type; I wanted them to have the vegetables mixed in not loaf ~ my error. I added vegetables each time I fed them and would not order this again to the point I have written myself a note not to order loaf of any kind since it seems harder for them to digest as solid as it is. Also I'm in a wheelchair and don't have to prepare extra food for them to give them the diet I want them to have as well as the taste and texture that they apparently really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny B

customer_reviews.title: My dog wags for Cesar
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a rescue from a puppy mill. Only those who have a dog from these circumstances can truly understand how frightened they are of everything, every quick move, & every new person. At first nothing seems to make them happy. As time goes by they slowly build trust. I have my little "Pippa" for just short of a year now and she progresses daily. When I pick up a canister of Cesar and begin to pull the tab - she begins to wag her tail and actually looks so happy and excited. She seems to enjoy every flavor and having a variety is so nice. Nothing makes me happier than watching my little rescue happy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Dog Hated Breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Tried to see if the dog would be interested in breakfast food. Negative! Overall she fought it but eventually would eat it but we have gone to the turkey flavor and she can't get enough of it. Good price, half serving for the 25lbs Catahoula with her regular food. This is a treat to help her actually eat her food when she is supposed to, or she starves all day because that's what she does.
customer_reviews.author: clarnp49

customer_reviews.title: DOG 3 DAYS VERY SICK!
customer_reviews.text: Have been feeding my small dogs this food for years, but the last batch a couple of weeks ago nearly killed my small dog. For three days after getting her regular dose from new shipment soft food, she had round-the-clock diahhrea and vomiting, ate nothing on fourth day. I now have her on basic organic people foods, but she is left with a very sensitive tummy.
customer_reviews.author: wiseshopper61

customer_reviews.title: Must taste good to dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Use these as the wet portion of dinners with the dry evolve duck formula, and sometimes Ollie or TruDog sprinkled and he loves it. Inexpensive 3.5 oz. portions as most groceries (.70 a Walmart, .79 at most groceries. We buy the 24 pack of the 4 various chicken concoctions via Amazon with no postage and near quick, no cost delivery as Prime members. This seems to be our Buddy's favorite vs. the $2.99 wet can foods that our pup snubs. Yes, he is spoiled, boiled chicken breasts many nights.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Hines Jr.

customer_reviews.title: dog food if your in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: typical dog food... dog will eat it just not as well as others..... states the weight as compared to others but there is more geleten left in the container and my dog was still hungry.... we bought this because our other favorite which has much less geletin and you can actually see pea's and carrots in the food and our dog is always satisfied....
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Gray-Green Mold
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered this monthly for some time now, but the quality or at least the freshness of the ingredients has been gradually declining, at least until this month. With this month's order, when we peel back the cover over the little food tub we are greeted with a uniform coat of ... gray-green slime. We are cancelling our monthly order and will certainly never order it again
customer_reviews.author: pompack

customer_reviews.title: The pate style is their favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have been eating this for years. They don't like anything else. I have three tiny dogs and I'm able to feed all three of them one can twice a day. it's a little high price but the dogs love it. And they seem to be in good health so I guess it's okay for them. My 3lb Chihuahua dances with joy every time I go and get a can to feed him. He dances around in little circles he gets so excited. I won't be changing anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: CESAR’S is our go too Dog Food. 💛
customer_reviews.text: Our Darling Mr.Sweets dearly love his Cesar’s We give it to him straight from the tin or we mix it with some dry•• Either way Mr.Sweets just loves it and and he loves us.. Our Adorable 11pound Rescue Mixed Poodle was a picky eater until we started buying Cesar’s now 5 years later he is Happy & Healthy Thank you CESAR’S You have never let us down 🤗🤗🤗
customer_reviews.author: DustiDarling...

customer_reviews.title: Dog liked it at first.. now won't touch it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely ate this up.. 3 tins a day. Now she will barely touch it and goes back to her old dogfood. I don't mind giving her a pricier choice, but it she's going to waste it, I'm not gonna buy it. It looks like real meat. There are real noodles in the chicken & noodle. I guess she just wants 'human food'.
customer_reviews.author: Large Marge

customer_reviews.title: wont even touch premium brands like fromm and merrik
customer_reviews.text: My dog is such a picky eater, wont even touch premium brands like fromm and merrik. He hunger strikes if he doesn’t like his food and is already a scrawny little guy but nature. These are the only thing he’ll consistently eat (mixed with some dry of the same brand). Makes his breath stink, and can’t imagine they’re very good for him, but he eats them- which is much better than a hunger strike. Like the size of the containers too. He’s an 11lb chiwennie and eats two containers a day (each mixed with 1/2 ceaser kibble).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 year old yorkshire terrier who just had to have 14 teeth removed. I was a bit nervous about her being able to eat regular food so I got the Cesar home delights. She loved them! They aren't the typical paste-like food there are actual chunks in a gravy. She is capable of eating regular food, but she likes this more! If you buy it I hope your dog likes it as much as mine did and thank you for taking the time to read my review.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Liberatore

customer_reviews.title: My Shih tzus love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Shih tzus live these! I have to give one of them medication for seizures. I poke the pill in this and give him half of the food. He looks forward to getting it every morning and night and never knows there is a pill in it! I think the flavor variety makes him think he is getting a treat! My little girl always has to have some too!!
customer_reviews.author: jeepchic

customer_reviews.title: 6/6 of my pups choose Cesar brand dog food!
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 pups and they love all of the Cesar products! I bought this pack for my sister's pups for Christmas. I don't expect anything but delight as a response. If anything changes, I'll update my review to reflect it since I've never ordered this online before. I don't plan on it changing, though. All of my dogs love these in any flavor. They also love the dry dog food of this brand, though they seem to love the rotisserie chicken and filet mignon flavors a little more than the slow roasted lamb. Even for finicky eaters, the dry food is good enough that they won't turn their noses away when they're hungry. I'd recommend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Doyle

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Bella is our little rescue Jack Russell Terrier who only weighs 12.5 pounds, and this is about the only food we can get her to eat, AND, she gobbles it up. We couldn't find out what food was given to her, so after trying one after another and speaking to our vet, this is what w landed on. Yippee!! Oh, she'll ONLY eat anything that's strictly beef. Spoiled, yes! But hey, that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Quality meals
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the original Cesar meals, this new Cesar Home Delights, you can see the ingredients whether it’s the peas, pasta, spices, or meat. My yorkie loves them and has not had any stomach issues
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Scruffy Approved !
customer_reviews.text: Scruffy approved!! He's relatively picky, so the fact he devours this speaks, er, BARKS, volumes. He's had many of the flavor varieties and hasn't turned his lil snout up at any of them. Two caveats though...price tends to soar at times, AND DELIVERY PROMISES ARE SELDOM KEPT (grrrr, Prime!! >.< )
customer_reviews.author: nitaell72

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price for these wet foods that I've been able to find. These are actually most of my dogs favorite flavors too, so this is a wonderful bundle for them. I wish the portion sizes were bigger, but that's mostly because my dogs love to be eat and eat and eat.... they'd probably eat the entire variety pack in a day if I let them.
customer_reviews.author: Shaen and Rebecca Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Too many for 1 box
customer_reviews.text: The product is great; my dogs love it. I’ve been ordering it from Amazon for years. However this last delivery of 6 packs of 24 was packed in one big box; the driver was even struggling to deliver it to my doorstep. Needless to say I couldn’t even budge it. I had to unbox it on the doorstep, which I hated doing. I wish Amazon would go back to delivering it in two boxes like it was always shipped, at least I can pick them up.
customer_reviews.author: Marge OConnor

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ONLINE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Cesar's dog food for about two years now and my dog loves it. Twice this year I have gotten lazy and opted to order the product from amazon instead of buying it in store. Both times my dog has had several stomach issues. The same happened to my brother's dog when he ordered another type brand food for his dog from amazon. I believe the issue to be the use of poor storing facilities! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT ONLINE!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: My girl likes it!
customer_reviews.text: The one food my picky little Shih-tzu will eat. She looks forward to it every morning and evening. The only thing I don't care for is that at times there will be a "chunk" of fat or grizzle in it; gross. But for the most part, I haven't had any issues with the quality. My girl won't even eat the expensive, high quality food. She prefers this over everything else. I would prefer for her to eat a better food, but if this makes my girl happy, then I will continue to buy it. Real review - paid full price, receive no compensation nor a request to write a review.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: My pupper loves it... happy me
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this variety, first time buying dog food in a decade... I have been making my own dog food for both my yorkies, one just passed at 13, my remaining pupper has had a hard time since her passing, not eating her usual food etc... so I tried this Cesar food and she devours it... I’m so pleased, one less thing to worry about... she’s going on 14
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: PONGO is a happy dog. He loves Cesar Wet Dog Food.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery-when you need pet food-order from Amazon. We lost this dog's Dad to heart problem and tumor in last month. His son-PONGO-refused to eat as he mourned the loss of his companion. We purchased Cesar Gourmet-and changed to a new bowl - now he eats readily. Great product-he prefers the steak type.!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Layne

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love this stuff -- you never have to call them twice for dinner.
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs -- a standard poodle (10 years old) and a chihuahua (8 years old). They both love this food. I supplement it with Kirkland wet dog food to make it go further -- as it is relatively expensive. This is their meal and their treat!!! The minute they hear the dishes rattling in the kitchen, they are there for dinner! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: grande2011

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my little dog’s favorite wet food. Now that I’m retired n on disability, I appreciate the price.
customer_reviews.author: MarcyC

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients in Cesar
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea that my dog really liked it and ate it by herself. She is going on 16 and had to spoon feed her so much. I got a coupon for 5 free and took advantage of it and tried it. Then ordered a case as she loved it . Because I read in the blogs that it didn't have all the good things in it I started feeding her the Cesar in the a.m. and then a half can of some good canned dog food and am happy as now she is doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Epson lvr

customer_reviews.title: My dog Lacy like this food very much.
customer_reviews.text: I add this can dog food to my dog dry kibble. This way she gets to have a good mixture of dry and wet food. My dog Lacy like this food very much, she would eat this only if I gave it to her. To much wet food is not good for her stomach, so a mixture is best. We both like that this comes in different flavors, she gets to have different flavors added to her kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great as a mixture.
customer_reviews.text: As a single source of nutrition, they are apparently great because the "puppy mill" we rescued her from fed our Maltese these; however, the drawback was bad teeth, gums, and breath because the mill didn't take care of her oral hygiene. We now feed her dry food but mix this into it because she won't eat the dry alone (probably because she spent about four years eating it exclusively!)
customer_reviews.author: Silver Eagle

customer_reviews.title: We have tried a variety of these gourmet packs and he seems to love everyone of them
customer_reviews.text: My shih tzu absolutely loves this! We only mix in a little bit each meal with his dry food and he always wants more. In fact, he doesn’t even go near his dry food unless there is some Cesar gourmet in there. We have tried a variety of these gourmet packs and he seems to love everyone of them. Will continue buying these for our little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Soli

customer_reviews.title: CESAR BELOVED FOR YEARS BY FUR BABIES
customer_reviews.text: I have two senior dogs that get Cesar daily with their other foods. I have used Cesar for a number of years now and my fur babies do ver well on it. I love i can order so many varieties here on Amazon and it be delivered so quickly to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Peachee Keene

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS BAD STUFF!! MY DOG ATE IT ALL
customer_reviews.text: BUT IT IS GARBAGE. IF YOU CARE ABOUT YOUR DOG?? PAY THE HIGHER PRICES FOR MERRICK WET DOG FOOD IN THE SAME LITTLE TUBS. IT IS HUMAN CONSUMPTION SAFE AND THE REPS WHO SELL THIS? THEY WILL OPEN A LITTLE DISH RIGHT IN FRONT OF YOU AND EAT IT!!! WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Our pups love this stuff!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these for our three shihtzus. We use one, split three ways to mix with dry food in the mornings. It also has enough gravy to mask the heart pill out older dog needs to take every day! It’s great because you can serve a different flavor each day to keep them interested in eating if you have picky eaters.
customer_reviews.author: Tlamb

customer_reviews.title: Nice package of flavors my dog likes!
customer_reviews.text: I have to purchase the pate type so that I can hide his pills in it. I cut it in little squares and hide his small pills inside a few of the squares. Good product. Easy to open and serve. Fast delivery. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen Kellner

customer_reviews.title: Good value for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie loves this dog food. I am never able to find this recipe in the grocery store, so I was thrilled to be able to order through Amazon. I always mix 1/2 can of regular and 1/2 can of fillets. Then I dice 1 slice of deli meat ( she loves sweet Lebanon bologna) and I mix all together and heat for 15 seconds in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H. Blanks

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit
customer_reviews.text: My miniature schnauzer is a good eater, but will get tired of eating the same thing. That is, until we started with Caesar meals. She gets one of these with some of her normal dry food. It never fails that the Caesar is gone almost immediately. It’s been good for her digestion, too. We’re big fans!
customer_reviews.author: sloth88

customer_reviews.title: something changed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several times in the past but my little dachshound walks away from this patch ,it does not even smell as good as it used to.,what happened on this patch? update I got one more box left she smells of this and walks away.It used to smell so good, not any more. I go back to pedigree.
customer_reviews.author: Inge D.

customer_reviews.title: Something bad is in the food
customer_reviews.text: This batch made all three of my dogs very sick. I thought it was just the small dog with vomiting and diarrhea so I stopped giving it to her and gave it to my bigger dogs and they too got sick this is the first time this happened but both boxes were bad.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Dried up too Fast?!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a case from Amazon. My dog liked it at first, however, he stopped eating after 3 weeks. They no longer look juicy with gravy. There were like half of the case remaining. Serve another tray which looks juicy from local store. He ate it again.
customer_reviews.author: Deals Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Yorkie likes it
customer_reviews.text: Our doggie likes this brand and this flavor selection. We’ve tried many others but keep coming back to this one. The cat even tries to get a bite or two if the dog lets her. We don’t feed it to the cat on purpose, she has her own cat food. We like that it is on subscribe and save to get more savings.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly gravy/sauce  Quality Way down
customer_reviews.text: Used to buy this on regular basis. It used to be mostly “food” Every time I open a new batch am noticing hardly any meat— mostly “gravy” Hard to find Cesars without sayce or gravy. They’ve ruined what used to be good food.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I could probably get a lot of grief from the over zealous dog lovers who feed their dogs the most expensive, or most laborious of foods to their pets. I have a small Chihuahua and he loves this food. His teeth are compromised so it's not only good tasting to him but easy for him to eat. It's just the right amount per serving. I have it in a subscription and i love the ease of that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Renfrow

customer_reviews.title: Toy Poodle Loves It
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several brands, but our picky dog rejected all of them until he was starving... With these he can't wait for lunch! Not to mention, it is much less expensive than most other brands and with Amazon saving you can not go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: PapaJace

customer_reviews.title: Cesar dog foods are Abbey’s favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: According to our little multipoo named Abbey there is nothing better than Cesar dog food for her meals. She is crazy about the poultry soft foods and won’t eat another brand. The small containers are the ideal size and a great price. We buy them in the 24 caseload and it’s a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Dogs are crazy for it!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs go crazy for Little Cesar -- every flavor available. Absolutely nothing beats it. Tried all the so-called, all natural, all meat, etc, brands. My pups turn their noses up at all that fancy stuff. The love this brand so much, they know the name. When I say Cesar, they start to drool & jump around in circles. Wish it wasn't SO expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Anne Laird

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment of Caesars Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Our Yorkie is very picky. She likes Caesars wet food but only the ones that have added flavor like cheese. This variety pack is a combination of the most flavorful ones. She'll actually eat them all and its easy to order this pack right to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Carly’s Picks

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My little dog with missing teeth loves these mixed with his dry food after I wet it and cook it in the micro. Then I smash it up and mix it with about half of one of these and he eats it all up. It is hard for an older dog (he will be 14 in Dec.) to get all he needs but this really worked.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Westerkamm

customer_reviews.title: My Papillons & PitBull LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I only give 1 of these per day, split 4 ways. I know that doesn’t sound like much, but if I give each one their own... they’d never eat Crunchy dog food again. I’ve been tempted to try it myself, seeing as how they all go NUTS for it! (But I decided against the temptation, because my Husband said he wouldnt ever kiss me again!!!!) Hahahahahahaha!!!
customer_reviews.author: ImaJewelaholic

customer_reviews.title: made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this for years. However, the last shipment I received contained bad quality food. My dog had diarrhea and vomits for 3 days while eating the turkey, green beans and potato flavor. I stopped the food for 2 days, dog recovered. Then I resumed and gave it back, and the dog got sick again with the same symptoms the next day. My dog is 14 years old, this can be really bad. Cesar, please check the quality of your product.
customer_reviews.author: pato

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety and my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 16 pound dog, he eats one little cup per night so this easily lasted us over 3 weeks. I love how it comes with a variety, four different flavors in this box! Its fairly inexpensive so its great when you are a little bit low on money but you still want to be able to give your dog a little more to their food. He doesn't get gassy or have any issues with this food at all!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for picky dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My very picky toy poodle loves this dog food! I have never before picked a food he likes the first time. He is transitioning from a puppy to an adult, and I started this food at 11 months. He gobbles it right down and doesn’t pick at it like the tens of puppy food I bought before this for him.
customer_reviews.author: amarieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Impressive poultry variety
customer_reviews.text: My dog was raised on Cesar’s dog food, but is still difficult to please. I tried the different Cesar’s and found he likes the loaf type over the others. Even with this, he is apparently getting tired of the poultry only so the next time I’ll have to get the beef/chicken pack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cesar Gourmet Wet Dog Food Variety Packs – 24 Trays
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:3.5 oz. (Packs of 24)

Dogs with sophisticated palates will enjoy a rich culinary experience with Cesar Canine Cuisine Gourmet Wet Dog Food. From large to small breeds, indulge your pampered pooch with savory dog food featuring a variety of poultry selections that make their mouth water and tail wag. Cesar Canine Cuisine Poultry Variety Pack Dog Food Delights connoisseurs with a tantalizing classic loaf in sauce texture, and is enhanced with vitamins and minerals for Complete and balanced nutrition. Served in convenient trays with no-fuss, peel-away freshness seals, Cesar Adult Dog Food makes mealtime easy. Our gourmet wet dog food also uses ingredients formulated to meet nutritional levels established by the AAFCO dog food nutrient profiles for maintenance.
feature_bullets: Contains (1) 24 count case of 3.5 ounce trays of Cesar Wet Dog Food Poultry Variety Pack: (6) Duck Recipe, (6) Grilled Chicken Flavor, (6) Oven Roasted, Chicken Flavor, (6) Turkey Recipe
Crafted without grains and with US Chicken, US Turkey or Duck as the #1 ingredient
Cesar Wet Dog Food is complete and balanced and fortified with vitamins and minerals to help dogs of all sizes, especially small breeds, stay healthy
Made in the USA with the world's finests ingredients, Cesar makes a great meal on its own or as a dog food topper mixed with dry food
This gourmet dog food is served in convenient trays with easy, peel-away freshness seals. Store - room temperature

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
